ui.narrative.title: Technical report — narrative
narrative.block0: Context, sample and active filters. This report describes municipal waste circularity in the EU27 for the base year {year}, with {subset_n} countries in the current subset. Filters: operation {op_human}; metric shown {show_human}; aggregation {agg_label}; countries {subset_n} ({geos_compact}). Shares (RCY, BIO, INC, LND) are percentages of the annual total per country; results are presented as {agg_label} mean ({kMean}%), median ({kMed}%) and full distribution.{endNote}
narrative.block1: 1) Mean level and intragroup variation. Average recycling (RCY) was {kMean}%, with median {kMed}%. The Top-3 reach {top3}% on average, while the Bottom-3 do not exceed {bot3}%.
narrative.block2: 2) Country ranking. In {year}, best performer was {best_code} ({best_val}%) and lowest was {worst_code} ({worst_val}%).
narrative.block3: 3) Median country composition. Median country {med_code} shows: RCY {med_rcy}%, BIO {med_bio}%, INC {med_inc}%, LND {med_lnd}%, Other {med_outros}%.
narrative.block4: 4) Temporal trajectories. Average trend (OLS) for {op_label} is {slope_ppya} pp/year.
narrative.block5: 5) End-of-line (LND+INC). Subset mean is {end_mean}%. Against the landfill target ≤10%, average gap is {gap_aterro_pp} pp.
narrative.block6: 6) Structural trade-off. RCY vs. LND+INC shows the expected negative relation.
narrative.block7: 7) Statistical distribution. min {box_min}%, Q1 {box_q1}%, median {box_med}%, Q3 {box_q3}%, max {box_max}%.
narrative.block8: 8) Associations between operations. Strongest association: {corr_pair}, ρ={corr_val}%.
narrative.endNote_tpl: Whenever LND+INC is not available in the selected year, series fallback is used; in this subset, year {year} was required to complete the indicator.
